content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Moira Dela Torre

This is a list of awards and nominations received by Filipino singer-songwriter Moira Rachelle Bustamante Cruzado Dela Torre, best known by her stage name Moira Dela Torre.
}}Music award|L.A. Music Awards Timeless Artist Of The Year Award|1|1}}

Other awards
*Wishclusive Elite Circle—Bronze Award - Image:Med 3.png for reaching 10 million views on her "Malaya" radio performance on Wish 107.5 radio.
*Wishclusive Elite Circle—Bronze Award - Image:Med 3.png for reaching 10 million views on her "Kung Di Rin Lang Ikaw" radio performance on Wish 107.5 with December Avenue.
*Wishclusive Elite Circle-Silver Award Image:Med 2.png for reaching 25 million views on her "Kung Di Rin Lang Ikaw" radio performance on Wish 107.5 with December Avenue.
